name: Die & Repair (GGJ 2020) (Dems972)
description:
HOW TO PLAY :

Press start, space, Enter or  "A" (xbox 360 controller) to play. Move with your Arrow Keys or LeftStick.

LeftShift or RB (xbox 360 controller) to Run. Space or "A" (xbox 360 controller) to jump . 

THE OBJECTIF :

You need to collect five pieces to repair the entity and win the game.....

It's not the purpose of this game, because we tried to hide something in our rules but right now, it's just this thing I can propose you. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

THE THING I WANT TO SAY ABOUT THIS GAME :

I have to admit we didn't successfully finish our game, because  the half quit in half of our project, and we had so much work to do, and not so much time to make it happen. So it's happening we have failed this task.

Sorry if it's bad, we know it, but we needed to publish something for this event, because despite everything it was fun to try to make a game with so much people... 

Thanks for reading, playing or/and for just seeing this thing.

Maybe the next year we will do great.

Credit for the Team : Select the "Crédit" button in the main menu

Plus d'informations
